an5.11:1.2: Pancimani, bhikkhave, tathagatassa tathagatabalani, yehi balehi samannagato tathagato asabham thanam patijanati, parisasu sihanadam nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti.
an5.11:1.5: imani kho, bhikkhave, panca tathagatassa tathagatabalani yehi balehi samannagato tathagato asabham thanam patijanati, parisasu sihanadam nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti”ti.
